Source.Name: match_1044.csv
sent: "We and third parties such as our customers, partners, and service providers use cookies and similar technologies (""cookies"") to provide and secure our Services, to understand and improve their performance, and to serve relevant ads (including job ads) on and off LinkedIn."

Source.Name: match_1044.csv
sent: For more information, see our Cookie Policy.

Source.Name: match_1044.csv
sent: Select Accept cookies to consent to this use or Manage preferences to make your cookie choices.

Source.Name: match_1044.csv
sent: You can change your cookie choices and withdraw your consent in your settings at any time.

Source.Name: match_1044.csv
sent: Manage preferences Accept cookies This LinkedIn website uses cookies and similar tools to improve the functionality and performance of this site and LinkedIn services, to understand how you use LinkedIn services, and to provide you with tailored ads and other recommendations.

Source.Name: match_1044.csv
sent: Third parties may also place cookies through this website for advertising, tracking, and analytics purposes.

Source.Name: match_1044.csv
sent: These cookies enable us and third parties to track your Internet navigation behavior on our website and potentially off of our website.

Source.Name: match_1044.csv
sent: By continuing your use of this website, you consent to this use of cookies and similar technologies.

Source.Name: match_1044.csv
sent: See our Cookie Policy for more information.

Source.Name: match_1044.csv
sent: dismiss Menu Open navigation Close navigation   User Agreement   Privacy Policy   Cookie Policy   Copyright Policy   California Privacy Disclosure     User Agreement   Privacy Policy   Cookie Policy   Copyright Policy   California Privacy Disclosure   Cookie Policy   Effective on October 1, 2020 At LinkedIn, we believe in being clear and open about how we collect and use data related to you.

Source.Name: match_1044.csv
sent: This Cookie Policy applies to any LinkedIn product or service that links to this policy or incorporates it by reference.

Source.Name: match_1044.csv
sent: We use cookies and similar technologies such as pixels, local storage and mobile ad IDs (collectively referred to in this policy as “cookies”) to collect and use data as part of our Services, as defined in our Privacy Policy (“Services”).

Source.Name: match_1044.csv
sent: ENTER A SUMMARY Type of technology Description Cookies A cookie is a small file placed onto your device that enables LinkedIn features and functionality.

Source.Name: match_1044.csv
sent: Any browser visiting our sites may receive cookies from us or cookies from third parties such as our customers, partners or service providers.

Source.Name: match_1044.csv
sent: We or third parties may also place cookies in your browser when you visit non-LinkedIn sites that display ads or that host our plugins or tags.

Source.Name: match_1044.csv
sent: We use two types of cookies: persistent cookies and session cookies.

Source.Name: match_1044.csv
sent: A persistent cookie lasts beyond the current session and is used for many purposes, such as recognizing you as an existing user, so it’s easier to return to LinkedIn and interact with our Services without signing in again.

Source.Name: match_1044.csv
sent: Since a persistent cookie stays in your browser, it will be read by LinkedIn when you return to one of our sites or visit a third party site that uses our Services.

Source.Name: match_1044.csv
sent: Session cookies last only as long as the session (usually the current visit to a website or a browser session).

Source.Name: match_1044.csv
sent: Pixels A pixel is a tiny image that may be embedded within web pages and emails, requiring a call (which provides device and visit information) to our servers in order for the pixel to be rendered in those web pages and emails.

Source.Name: match_1044.csv
sent: We use pixels to learn more about your interactions with email content or web content, such as whether you interacted with ads or posts.
point_text: We use pixels to learn more about your interactions with email content
point_title: Tracking pixels are used in service-to-user communication

Source.Name: match_1044.csv
sent: Pixels can also enable us and third parties to place cookies on your browser.

Source.Name: match_1044.csv
sent: Local storage Local storage enables a website or application to store information locally on your device(s).

Source.Name: match_1044.csv
sent: Local storage may be used to improve the LinkedIn experience, for example, by enabling features, remembering your preferences and speeding up site functionality.

Source.Name: match_1044.csv
sent: Other similar technologies We also use other tracking technologies, such as mobile advertising IDs and tags for similar purposes as described in this Cookie Policy.

Source.Name: match_1044.csv
sent: Our cookie tables list some of the cookies that are used by us and third parties as part of our Services.

Source.Name: match_1044.csv
sent: Please note that these tables may be updated from time to time to provide you with the latest information.

Source.Name: match_1044.csv
sent: What are these technologies used for?

Source.Name: match_1044.csv
sent: Below we describe the ways in which we may use cookies.

Source.Name: match_1044.csv
sent: ENTER SUMMARY Purpose Description Authentication We use cookies to recognize you when you visit our Services.

Source.Name: match_1044.csv
sent: If you’re signed into LinkedIn, cookies help us show you the right information and personalize your experience in line with your settings.

Source.Name: match_1044.csv
sent: Security We use cookies to make your interactions with our Services faster, more secure and to help us detect malicious activity and violations of our User Agreement.

Source.Name: match_1044.csv
sent: Preferences, features and services We use cookies to enable the functionality of our Services, and provide you with features, insights and customized content.

Source.Name: match_1044.csv
sent: We also use these technologies to remember information about your browser and your preferences.

Source.Name: match_1044.csv
sent: Functional We use cookies to improve your experience on our Services.

Source.Name: match_1044.csv
sent: Plugins on and off LinkedIn We use cookies to enable LinkedIn plugins both on and off the LinkedIn sites.
point_text: We use cookies to enable LinkedIn plugins both on and off the LinkedIn sites.

Source.Name: match_1044.csv
sent: Our plugins may be found on LinkedIn or third-party sites, such as the sites of our customers and partners.

Source.Name: match_1044.csv
sent: If you interact with a plugin, the plugin will use cookies to identify you and initiate your request.

Source.Name: match_1044.csv
sent: You can learn more about plugins here.

Source.Name: match_1044.csv
sent: Personalized Advertising Cookies help us show you relevant advertising, both on and off our Services and measure the performance of such ads and report on it.

Source.Name: match_1044.csv
sent: We use cookies to learn whether content has been shown to you or whether someone who was presented with an ad later came back and took an action (e.g., downloaded a white paper or made a purchase) on another site.

Source.Name: match_1044.csv
sent: Similarly, our partners or service providers may use cookies to determine whether we’ve shown an ad or a post and how it performed or provide us with information about how you interact with ads.
point_text: Similarly, our partners or service providers may use cookies to determine whether we’ve shown an ad or a post and how it performed or provide us with information about how you interact with ads.

Source.Name: match_1044.csv
sent: We may also work with our customers and partners to show you an ad on or off LinkedIn, such as after you’ve visited a customer’s or partner’s site or application.

Source.Name: match_1044.csv
sent: For further information regarding the use of cookies for advertising purposes, please see Sections 1.4 and 2.4 of the Privacy Policy.

Source.Name: match_1044.csv
sent: We or our service providers, use cookies to determine and measure the performance of ads or posts on and off LinkedIn and to learn whether you have interacted with our or our customers’ websites, content or emails and provide analytics based on those interactions.

Source.Name: match_1044.csv
sent: We also use cookies to provide aggregated information to our customers and partners as part of our Services.

Source.Name: match_1044.csv
sent: If you are a LinkedIn member but logged out of your account on a browser, LinkedIn may still continue to log your interaction with our Services on that browser for up to 30 days in order to generate usage analytics for our Services.

Source.Name: match_1044.csv
sent: We may share these analytics in aggregate form with our customers.

Source.Name: match_1044.csv
sent: What third parties use these technologies in connection with our Services?

Source.Name: match_1044.csv
sent: Third parties such as our customers, partners and service providers may use cookies in connection with our Services.

Source.Name: match_1044.csv
sent: For example, third parties may use cookies in their LinkedIn pages, job posts and their advertisements on and off LinkedIn for their own marketing purposes.

Source.Name: match_1044.csv
sent: For an illustration, please visit LinkedIn’s Help Center.

Source.Name: match_1044.csv
sent: Third parties may also use cookies in connection with our off-site Services, such as LinkedIn ad services.

Source.Name: match_1044.csv
sent: Third parties may use cookies to help us to provide our Services.

Source.Name: match_1044.csv
sent: We may also work with third parties for our own marketing purposes and to enable us to analyze and research our Services.

Source.Name: match_1044.csv
sent: Your Choices You have choices on how LinkedIn uses cookies.

Source.Name: match_1044.csv
sent: Please note that if you limit the ability of LinkedIn to use cookies, you may worsen your overall user experience, since it may no longer be as personalized to you.

Source.Name: match_1044.csv
sent: It may also stop you from saving customized settings like login information.

Source.Name: match_1044.csv
sent: Targeted Advertising As described here, you have choices regarding the use of your personal data for targeted advertising.

Source.Name: match_1044.csv
sent: Some mobile device operating systems such as Android and iOS provide the ability to control the use of mobile advertising IDs for ads personalization.

Source.Name: match_1044.csv
sent: You can learn how to use these controls by visiting the manufacturer’s website for both Android and iOS.

Source.Name: match_1044.csv
sent: Browser Controls Most browsers allow you to control cookies through their settings, which may be adapted to reflect your consent to the use of cookies.

Source.Name: match_1044.csv
sent: Further, most browsers also enable you to review and erase cookies, including LinkedIn cookies.

Source.Name: match_1044.csv
sent: To learn more about browser controls, please consult the documentation that your browser manufacturer provides.

Source.Name: match_1044.csv
sent: Manage Cookie Preferences Where required, we enable you to reject the use of certain cookies for purposes such as advertising and analytics and research, by visiting your cookie settings, without affecting the lawfulness of processing based on your consent before its withdrawal.

Source.Name: match_1044.csv
sent: For members, your settings can be found here.

Source.Name: match_1044.csv
sent: For guests, your settings can be found here.

Source.Name: match_1044.csv
sent: You can change your preferences at any time by visiting these settings.

Source.Name: match_1044.csv
sent: What is Do Not Track (DNT)?

Source.Name: match_1044.csv
sent: DNT is a concept that has been promoted by regulatory agencies such as the U.S. Federal Trade Commission (FTC), for the Internet industry to develop and implement a mechanism for allowing Internet users to control the tracking of their online activities across websites by using browser settings.

Source.Name: match_1044.csv
sent: As such, LinkedIn does not generally respond to “do not track” signals.

Source.Name: match_1044.csv

sent: Analytics and research Cookies help us learn more about how well our Services and plugins perform in different locations.
point_text: Analytics and research Cookies help us learn more about how well our Services and plugins perform in different locations. We or our service providers use cookies to understand, improve, and research products, features and services, including as you navigate through our sites or when you access LinkedIn from other sites, applications or devices.
